name: Eternal (itch)
description:
Eternal is a classic-esq top-down shooter for Mac and PC. There are 5 levels and tons of different weapons and enemy types. 360 controller is supported, though the button mapping may be a bit off on mac due to the button mapping on the Mac drivers being different for some reason. Just enable controller support in the options.
Thanks for playing!
How far can YOU get?
Like the Facebook page to get updates about Eternal and other games II'll be making.
